sentences.sContent: It is clearly to sec that sway motion is increased with the increasing of the length of hawser.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is clearly to sec that sway motion is increased with the increasing of the length of hawser.
sentences.sCn: 计算结果表明，随着系缆索的长度的增加，油船的摇艏运动明显增大。

trans.tranCn: 大缆, 曳船索, 系船索
trans.tranOther: A hawser is a large heavy rope, especially one used on a ship
